summary: The lost legend of the deep nord city voltheim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6DDmbpu.png[/img]
There was once a book I found which explained the details of how nords first came to settle in Skyrim. It was there I learnt about the fabled ruins in the Velothi mountain range. Little is known about it but some records suggest that it extends into the very depths of the mountain itself. - Wanderer

This mod is going to take a while because the area I am creating is going to be huge, like really BIG. Voltheim is a Huge dungeon mod with a Quest that takes place inside of it, you will gain new followers and new equipment.Â
author: D4rkh0p3
